channel.title: Mine field 2 (bm_c2a5e ), cannot save the guard and it doesn't matter [Fixed]
channel.description:
On the level bm_c2a5e there is a scene with a guard crawling on the ground begging for help. A scientist approaches him, but then you see a laser beam from a vent, and - BAM! - a sniper kills the guard (and may kill the scientist too).
Now, with the rocket launcher you can kill the sniper. There are, however, a few issues 1. You CANNOT kill the sniper beforeahand. If you haven't seen the guard on the ground begging to save him, you can shoot the vent, and it doesn't get destroyed. 2. If you kill the sniper, the guard dies (??) anyway. The scientist keeps staying obent over him, both say nothing - no thanks, no examplanation, no reaction at all. 3. If you kill the guard, the sniper DOESN'T EVEN SHOW UP, though you can still kill him shooting at the vent.
Err.. this looks kinda strange. :slight_smile: One would expect at least some kind of a reaction. ![BlackMesa_c2a5e_guard_sniper_scientist.jpg|690x500](upload://4IaFbr7kjD1mOlsH3IuFtexVXVU.jpeg)
